linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux, version 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Starfend Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Graphics Card from the last 10 years
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
